Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Ashland/Cortland
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Elston, North Avenue, and Ashland due to, street blockage at Ashland/Cortland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, Elston, North Avenue, and Ashland due to, street blockage at Ashland/Cortland.

Allow extra travel time.
